SHAREHOLDER ALERT!I just wanted to make anyone who owns NCLH, CCL or RCL aware that there is one person on ALL major cruise message boards that constantly post negative fake news, lie after lie, bankruptcy talk, share dilutions and anything else he feels like spreading is on this board and other cruise boards. This user in a heartbeat will go from acting like a short player with some of hi aliases to a long with the other half and play both sides.He has admitted on the CCL board that he has no skin in the game with CCL.He is very well known on the CCL board with 73 different usernames. Approximately 95% of all posts on the CCL board including replies to messages, thumbs up or down are all his. You will also notice all conversations he has are with himself and all his alias’s.If he does not post on the CCL board, there is literally no action on that board by legit users. He has chased them all away.He has also over the last 18 months especially the first 8-12 months of the COVID crash stolen identities from people by copying their profile images and using their names and posting messages that were negative, derogatory, inflammatory, sexual, hateful, and just about anything you can think of.There is plenty of proof submitted to verify all this. (He does delete quite a bit of his messages) however, the are saved.Just to give you heads up here are just a short list of the usernames he uses if you have seen them on your message boards:Please keep in mind that this guy deletes messages all the time but please check out your board and especially the CCL board to see what I am talking about.Chart MasterJeffIssayStacy Gap Tooth AbramsIce EhBillRobertKeithZWolf Of Wall StreetWin Or LoseDavidHabibAllenCarn-Evil C.LShowtimePrincess CaysGeorgeKevinAnd many many more.Please take it for what it is worth……… NOTHING, it is all fake.

Pfizer's COVID vaccine appears safe and effective for children 5-11, new data showsUpdated 9:17 am EDT Oct. 22, 2021Over the next two weeks, two government agencies will have to decide whether newly released data from Pfizer-BioNTech is convincing enough to justify authorizing COVID-19 vaccines for children ages 5 through 11.Because children are unlikely to become severely ill from COVID-19, vaccines have to be incredibly safe and have a significant impact on the pandemic to justify their use in this age group, experts say.

As of 1600hrs S&P & NASDAQ showed nice gains. NASDAQ listed NCL is also having a nice day by our standards only down .10 cents. Ships Ahoy to all my fellow NCL shareholders. After spending 3 hours reading NCL's 2nd quarter financial statement posted on their official site. Would call it an interesting read. For those who can decipher financial statements would seriously suggest you read every word. Del Rio is not the type of CEO who is capable to navigate NCL from financial ruin. Owning 1 share of NCL purchased pre-market am. I question why my fellow shareholders approved 490 million more shares? Del Rio spells out NCL continue's to look for more outside funding. Statement clearly shows all the countries were NCL has already taken on more debt. Yet my fellow shareholders approved 490 million more share's. Further depleting NCL's stock value. As all major cruise lines are basically operating all vessels. We shareholders should feel confident Del Rio announced he wants entire fleet of 50+ vessels on the high sea's by April 2022. Only 5 more months of almost zero revenue. Silent Bull once wrote the market is a forward looking instrument. Which he is 100% correct. Unfortunately as NCL shareholders that statement implies you own a piece of a functioning company. Stocks are about making money. I am now an NCL shareholder. Would never hold on to a company to prove some bizarre point. NCL has basically not operated in 18 months. If I said got a great stock tip. Buy Delta airlines tomorrow. You naturally ask who gave you the tip and what did your tipster mention. He's a pilot on Monday Delta is going to announce for the next 18 months we are only going to maintain our NY/London Heathrow Airport 5 flights. Would you then buy the stock tomorrow? Not the way business works. Slice a cake anyway you want its still a cake. If you're in the bakery, restaurant business presentation matters. No customer is going to purchase a cake which someone punched their fist into even if it taste great. If you're in the cruise business you need passengers and ports of call. It's not rocket science. When a CEO of any company writes we hope to be back to full capacity in April 2022. Guess what NCL's share price is not going to sky rocket from $25.50.Contrary!!! NCL barely operating and adding debt everyday IS A GREAT STOCDK TO OWN!!!! I don't give a hoot what any analyst says. Take a look at the institutional holders. Look at the insider trading of top NCL executives. I have not looked because have any understanding of BR talk. If a nitwit shareholder like myself read that Del Rio & any of his Regent Cruise Line's cronies sold any shares. It means one of two things they are totally incompetent or bankruptcy is on the horizon. I read every NCL executive bio last night. Known worked for a major cruise line in the past. Sh-t stocks are to make money. The S&P is up 50% YTD. I can tell you after the next earning report which believe comes out next month will not cause NCL' stock price to sky rocket. You know why because they are barely operating. If your neighborhood supermarket sold everything 18 months ago. Now they only sell milk, eggs, water and spinach for the last 18 month are you so in love with that supermarket you're willing to keep supporting the neighborhood supermarket and only eat eggs and drink milk or water. No your going a half mile away to a fully stocked supermarket. Some guy wrote me it's your state. I actually said after reading thats someone so bullheaded to hold something as the market has sky rocketed since mid-April 2020 to prove your loyalty to a company. Save loyalty for loved ones buy stocks to make money. I may live in Florida know the players in the shipping business and will tell you Del Rio does not have the clout to move the needle. Big business is done behind close doors. Why would a Judge continue to keep ruling against NCL now after all major close lines are operating a higher court rules differently. Making it appear to the outside world NCL was in the right. I look at it differently NCL's weak management team did not act in the best interest of us the shareholders. I would not get into a legal battle for a multitude of reasons. NCL only has one GC. I guarantee you he was not involved in any of NCL documented ridiculous court battle's. I would guess by this time next year we all should receive a letter from Goldman, Stearns and Goldberg asking all shareholders to take part in the class action lawsuit which definitely will be forthcoming.
Looking forward the earnings. Cash flows and trying to understand current cruise profitability (?] are my main points of interest.

12-3-2020 close $25.42. I mentioned on June 2,2020 this board. I am a representative on the Florida cruise ship council board. My stevedoring company handles both cargo & cruise vessels on average 1.75 ships per day 365 days a year in Port Miami. Been doing it for 30 years. Yet cruise stocks will not sky rocket anytime soon. I could go into a multitude of reasons. So I decided to stop by the board. Silent Bull is still preaching to his much much smaller flock. The benchmark MM use is the S&P on June 2,2020 closed at 3,055. At this moment 10-20-21 S&P 4535.It has appreciated 50%. Had you invested 50k in the S&P ON 6-2-20. You now have $75,000. In an extremely safe conservative investment. Had you purchased 50k of NCL on 12-3-20. On 10-20-21 you made zero. Anyone who understands investing would be hard pressed to have bought quality companies while the S&P appreciates 50% and have not made good money.

And in all honestly who didn't already know that? Of course we wont be at pre covid levels. I am still positive on the long term for NCLH, but the past two weeks have been beyond frustrating. Pfizer and BioNTech ask the FDA to approve shots for younger kidsYesterday Pfizer-BioNTech asked the FDA to issue an emergency use authorization for its vaccine in kids ages 5 to 11. The drugmakers are submitting relevant data, including information on how it will formulate the two pediatric doses, which are each one-third of those given to adults. The agency is tentatively scheduled to discuss this in an October 26 meeting, and a CDC advisory panel meeting has been scheduled for November 2 and 3, which means shots for children in this age group could be available shortly after that. Many parents are eager to get their kids vaccinated and experts have said that inoculating younger Americans is a key step in ending this pandemic.

Norwegian occupancy rate will come up much higher than 36% Royal Caribbean reported an occupancy rate of 36.4%, well below an already-low 48.5% predicted by analysts.The company's occupancy rate is a measure of the amount of available passenger capacity, or cabins, being utilized and is a key measure of Royal Caribbean's overall business.Royal Caribbean expects that 50 of its 61 ships will have returned to service by the end of 2021.The company announced that sailings for 2022 are booked within historical ranges and at higher prices than 2019.
